articles.description: Spotify's HiFi audio delay might pay off, as there are now more people willing to pay more for premium audio than when the plan was first announced.
articles.content: In February 2021, Spotify announced its high-quality audio offering, called HiFi, and released a promotional video featuring Billie Eilish and her brother/producer, Finneas, waxing about the benefits… [+4558 chars]
